While she may certainly be depressed due to her weight, before we call this clinical depression, make sure you have ruled out conditions such as diabetes and hypothyroidism. I have seen more than one patient (more commonly female as hypothyroidism is more common in females) come in with fatigue, obesity and signs of clinical depression, who on further testing (simple blood test) was found to be hypothyroid.
